com.viglet.turing.apps.contentIndex
Class ContentIndexDriver

java.lang.Object
  com.viglet.turing.apps.contentIndex.ContentIndexDriver

public class ContentIndexDriver
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as Driver for the vgncontentreindex command-line utility. The purpose of the utility is to perform re-indexing of existing, searchable Content Instance(s) and Static Files by command line specified Object Type.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method.

Parameters:
args - command line arguments

performProcessing

public void performProcessing(java.lang.String[] args)
Encapsulates the core 'driver' functionality. 1. Processes/Validates inputs. 2. Tests VCM and search engine Connections. 3. Retrieves Content Instances by Content Type. 4. Pushes Content Instances to the search engine for (re)indexing.

Parameters:
args - String[] Command line params
